text: Digaula hagalee hagakala ginaadou, gaa tongo. Digaula hagalee hai hegau gi nia duu madamada, gaa nnoo nadau gahu wae gi nia loahi. Nia ngaahulu nadau libogo ga mmoonono, ga ngaadihole. Digaula ga hagalee ulu i nia gahu humalia, gaa hai nia mee gahu balumee. Nadau madamada gaa huli gaa hai di haga langaadia.
